data.text:
@katheri75511172 @eveamk Dr Tom Cowan explains how they came up with a sequence for the fraud. 

This too. https://t.co/ndbYc3ng4C
@MsPinkest1968 @eveamk Absolutely. I question the “virus” theory vs. general health. It’s very hard to unlearn what we thought we knew and relearn these theories about ID.

@PierreD70226434 @VanessaFuchsArt @1ittleMERSmaid @eveamk @MichaelSalamone well.  it finally happened.  I fucked up.  I posted a different post about seat belts being like masks and that it was absurd to not have seatbelts unless you WANT max damage during accident. I will remove my big nose from ya'll's diatribe
@s_zatzkis @VanessaFuchsArt @1ittleMERSmaid @eveamk @MichaelSalamone I was responding to this.... https://t.co/nmvroRRFFh
@s_zatzkis @VanessaFuchsArt @1ittleMERSmaid @eveamk @MichaelSalamone I was responding to someone else

@PierreD70226434 @VanessaFuchsArt @1ittleMERSmaid @eveamk @MichaelSalamone no. seatbelt is mask, effective mask N95 if you will.  I don't need my analogies over/erroneously  analyzed by the dull wit of Lucky Pierre.  Thank you very much.

@VanessaFuchsArt @s_zatzkis @1ittleMERSmaid @eveamk @MichaelSalamone No. I pointed out to you that your "seatbelt" (the cloth mask) is a joke. 

https://t.co/ee7km92xYg
